detaileddescription.para: Default filter is just a field = value
Return array of mode strings in preference order from query string or configuration.
Return the pagination start from getVar or session
Return the pagination limit from getVar or session

simplesect.para: array of start, limit from getVar or from Session for current url
string suitable for use in url query string, keys are lower cased

detaileddescription.para: Returns map of parameters (getVars and urlParams) this Filters derived class handles. Merges in with preference passed params if provided.
Provide a unique key for this request, e.g. for caching, UI state storage etc. By default this is without taking getVars into account.

parameterdescription.para: type of thing being cached, e.g. 'sort' or 'model'
of request to store key for, if null current url is used, otherwise whatever is passed (could be '' for all requests)

detaileddescription.para: Clear all session variables that start with the gridlist session key prefix (self.KeyPrefix).
Return value of particular url parameter, filters out one's we're not interested in and caches those we are.
Return only the url parameters we are interested in
Return a get var if it is one we are interested in, lookup is lowercased, return value is urldecoded. Values are cached for both lower and uppercase (so get and urlParam) options.
Return only the get vars we are interested in, keys are lowercased, values are trimmed
Return a get var if it is one we are interested in, lookup is lowercased, return value is urldecoded. Values are cached for both lower and uppercase (so get and urlParam) options.
Return only the get vars we are interested in, keys are lowercased
Lookup name in the provided cache key-value and save it to the session if required depending on seesionPersistance parameter.
